item.title: Zack Snyder's New Movie Is Unlike Anything He's Ever Done & It's More Exciting Than Another DC Movie
item.description: While Zack Snyder is best known for his DC movies, his next project is the perfect change in direction and could be his most exciting film yet.

item.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Images Reveal New Look At Reed Richards, Sue Storm, Johnny Storm & Ben Grimm In Their Space Suits
item.description: New official images of the Fantastic Four wearing their blue-and-white space suits have just been released for The Fantastic Four: First Steps.

item.title: "I Shouldn't Be Even Telling You This": Pierce Brosnan Recalls How An Injury Nearly Derailed His First Day As James Bond On GoldenEye
item.description: Pierce Brosnan recalls that his very first day filming as James Bond on GoldenEye was nearly derailed by a finger injury that required a unique fix.
